ability.name: The Darkin Blade
ability.description: Aatrox cleaves the area in front of him, dealing damage to enemies inside it.

ability.name: Summon Tibbers
ability.description: Annie summons Tibbers to fight alongside her dealing damage to enemies in the area.

ability.name: Curse of the Sad Mummy
ability.description: Amumu explodes in an infernal tantrum, dealing magic damage to all enemies, and stunning them.

ability.name: Ranger's Focus
ability.description: Ashe gains attack speed and replacing her basic attacks with a flurry of 5 arrows for 5 seconds.

ability.name: Arise!
ability.description: Azir summons a Sand Soldier for 6 seconds. When Azir attacks an enemy in a soldier's range, the soldier attacks as well.

ability.name: Pyroclasm
ability.description: Brand launches a bouncing fireball, damaging enemies hit.

ability.name: Unbreakable
ability.description: Braum creates a barrier that blocks all incoming damage.

ability.name: Pale Cascade
ability.description: Diana creates 3 orbs that spin around her and explode upon contact with an enemy, dealing magic damage. Additionally, Diana gains a shield for 3 seconds.

ability.name: Adrenaline Rush
ability.description: Dr Mundo creates a toxic cloud around him that deals damage to nearby enemies and heals for a portion of the damage every second for 8 seconds.

ability.name: Ice Shot
ability.description: Ezreal fires a shard of ice at the lowest HP unit, dealing magic damage and applying on-hit effects.

ability.name: Triggerseed
ability.description: Ivern grants a shield to the ally with the lowest health.

ability.name: Monsoon
ability.description: Janna channels winds which heal allies based on their maximum health and stun nearby enemies for 1 second.

ability.name: Counter Strike
ability.description: Jax dodges all incoming attacks for 2 seconds, then strikes nearby enemies, stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

ability.name: Void Assault
ability.description: Kha'Zix goes stealth and attacks the enemy with the lowest health after a short delay. This attack is a critical hit and restores mana.

ability.name: Dance of Dread
ability.description: Wolf mauls Kindred's target, dealing magic damage and reducing healing by 80% to her target for 5 seconds, while Lamb leaps away from Kindred's target.

ability.name: Living Artillery
ability.description: Kog'Maw fires a living artillery shell at an enemy, dealing damage.

ability.name: Ethereal Chains
ability.description: Leblanc flings an illusory chain toward a random enemy, dealing damage and stunning them after 1.5 seconds.

ability.name: The Culling
ability.description: Lucian fires in a direction dealing physical Damage, applying on-hits and dealing additional magic damage.

ability.name: Final Spark
ability.description: Lux fires a straight beam of light at enemies. If an enemy is killed, she restores 50 mana.

ability.name: Unstoppable Force
ability.description: Malphite charges toward a random enemy, dealing damage and knocking all nearby enemies into the air and stunning them.

ability.name: Shadow Swarm
ability.description: Malzahar creates a shadow portal, summoning 2 Shadow Spawn. The Shadow Spawn hit for magic damage each attack. Shadow Spawn benefit from active Shadow trait bonuses.

ability.name: Sap Magic
ability.description: After taking damage from a spell, Maokai's next attack will heal him.

ability.name: Meditate
ability.description: Master Yi becomes channels for 1.5 seconds, becoming untargetable and recovering health. After that, attacks deal additional magic damage for 6 seconds.

ability.name: Tidal Wave
ability.description: Nami sends a massive wave toward a random enemy, damaging and knocking up enemies it passes through and granting allies it passes through bonus magic damage on hit.

ability.name: Fury of the Dawn
ability.description: Nasus temporarily enrages, gaining bonus health and damaging adjacent enemies each second for the duration.

ability.name: Depth Charge
ability.description: Nautilus sends out a depth charge that seeks out the furthest enemy champion, knocking them up and stunning them for a really long time.

ability.name: Blooming Burst
ability.description: Neeko throws a seed at a random target, exploding three times with increasing radius, dealing damage to all enemies hit by each explosion.

ability.name: Steel Blades
ability.description: Every third attack, Nocturne deals additional damage to enemies around him and heals for a portion of the damage.

ability.name: Berserker Rage
ability.description: Olaf gains attack speed and lifesteal, and becomes immune to crowd control until the end of battle.

ability.name: Electrifying Breath
ability.description: Ornn unleashes lightning bolts in a cone in front of him, dealing damage and increasing his critical strike chance by 20% for 4 seconds.

ability.name: Edge of Ixtal
ability.description: Qiyana dashes to the side of her target and throws a blast of wind through them, damaging and stunning enemies it passes through.

ability.name: Furious Bite
ability.description: Rek'Sai bites an enemy dealing true damage.

ability.name: Cull the Meek
ability.description: Renekton swings his blade, dealing damage to nearby enemies and restoring health.

ability.name: Piercing Darknes
ability.description: Senna fires a beam through her furthest ally, dealing magic damage to enemies, and buffing allies' on-hits for 5 seconds damage from Senna.

ability.name: Poison Trail
ability.description: Singed leaves a poison cloud behind him damaging enemies in the area over 4 seconds.

ability.name: Decimating Smash
ability.description: Sion smashes his axe into the ground after a short delay, dealing damage and knocking up enemies in the area.

ability.name: Ricochet
ability.description: For the next 5 seconds, Sivir's attacks will bounce up to 10 times to nearby enemies, dealing damage and applying on-hit effects.

ability.name: Crystalline Exoskeleton
ability.description: Skarner is shielded for 8 seconds. While the shield persists, Skarner gains attack speed.

ability.name: Equinox
ability.description: Soraka creates a zone at a random enemy's location, dealing magic damage and preventing mana from being restored to enemies inside.

ability.name: Hydro Sphere
ability.description: Syndra conjures a sphere of water near a random enemy which explodes dealing magic damage to all enemies hit.

ability.name: Seismic Shove
ability.description: Taliyah causes the ground to rise under the enemy with the most Mana, dealing damage and either pushing or pulling them toward her.

ability.name: Cosmic Radiance
ability.description: After a delay, Taric and all nearby allies become invulnerable for a few seconds.

ability.name: Deep Sea Lantern
ability.description: Thresh throws his lantern to the lowest-health ally, shielding them and nearby allies for 5 seconds.

ability.name: Spray and Pray
ability.description: Twitch gains increased damage and unlimited range for 8 seconds.

ability.name: Piercing Arrow
ability.description: Varus charges for 1.5 seconds and fires an arrow, dealing damage to all enemies in a line.

ability.name: Silver Bolts
ability.description: Vayne deals bonus true damage every third attack based on the enemy's maximum health.

ability.name: Primordial Burst
ability.description: Veigar blasts an enemy with magical energy. This spell instantly kills if the enemy is a lower star level than Veigar.

ability.name: Drain
ability.description: Vladimir damages a target enemy, healing himself for the damage dealt.

ability.name: Frenzied Bite
ability.description: Volibear bites an enemy. If the target has less than 35% health, it is killed instantly and Volibear fully restores his mana.

ability.name: Infinite Duress
ability.description: Warwick pounces onto the lowest health enemy, stunning, damaging, and applying on-hit effects while healing himself.

ability.name: Last Breath
ability.description: Yasuo teleports to the enemy with the most items, knocking them up in the air for 1 second and slashing them repeatedly.

ability.name: Shepherd of Souls
ability.description: Yorick blesses his allies with the lowest health, not including Light Walkers. When they die, they resurect as Light Walkers and benefits from the effects of the Light origin.

ability.name: Living Shadow
ability.description: Zed creates a clone of himself behind his current target. This clone inherits its creator's items, stats, and current health, and can cast Living Shadow. Its mana cost is 50 higher.

ability.name: Rampant Growth
ability.description: Zyra summons two Flame Spitters at a random location at the edge of the arena. The Flame Spitters attack the nearest enemy for 3 seconds, dealing damage per attack a total of 4 times.
